ComicInfo.Summary: The Possession: Part 3: Avengelyne has been demonically possessed and continues to do Taliesen's bidding as he attempts to collect seven magical talismans before the time of the great convergence. He sends her to get the last amulet that is being held by Crymelord and B'lial. Avengelyne is tricked by her foes who trap her in a circle of power. Father Peter prepares to perform an exorcism.
ComicInfo.Tags: B'liale,Devlin Trask,Crymelord,Peter Clifton,Avengelyne,New York City,Taliesin,New York State
ComicInfo.Title: The Possession: Part 3
ComicInfo.Writer: Rob Liefeld,Robert Place Napton,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Robert Napton
